tts.limit_invalid: ‚ùå Limit must be between 100 and 4096 characters.
tts.command_on: ‚Ä¢ /tts on ‚Äî Enable automatic TTS for replies
tts.summary_on: ‚Ä¢ Summary ON: AI summarizes, then generates audio
tts.summary_off: ‚Ä¢ Summary OFF: Truncates text, then generates audio
tts.examples_text: /tts provider edge\n/tts limit 2000\n/tts audio Hello, this is a test!
tts.audio_usage_text: Usage: /tts audio <text>\nExample: /tts audio Hello, this is a test!
tts.limit_description:
Text longer than this triggers summary (if enabled).
Range: 100-4096 chars (Telegram max).

To change: /tts limit <number>
Example: /tts limit 2000
tts.summary_description:
When text exceeds {maxLen} chars:
‚Ä¢ ON: summarizes text, then generates audio
‚Ä¢ OFF: truncates text, then generates audio

To change: /tts summary on | off

slack.label: Slack
slack.setup_instructions:
4) Enable Event Subscriptions (socket) for message events

Tip: set SLACK_BOT_TOKEN + SLACK_APP_TOKEN in your env.

Manifest (JSON):
slack.allowlist_description: Allowlist Slack DMs by username (we resolve to user ids).
slack.token_missing_use_ids: Slack token missing; use user ids (or mention form) only.
slack.failed_resolve_usernames: Failed to resolve usernames. Try again.
slack.bot_display_name_message: Slack bot display name (used for manifest)
slack.env_tokens_detected: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN + SLACK_APP_TOKEN detected. Use env vars?
slack.tokens_configured_keep: Slack tokens already configured. Keep them?

imessage.setup_tips:
This is still a work in progress.
Ensure OpenClaw has Full Disk Access to Messages DB.
Grant Automation permission for Messages when prompted.
List chats with: imsg chats --limit 20
